projet.pictionnary.breton.model

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • projet.pictionnary.breton.model.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to represent a game and its users of Pictionnary.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Table

        public Table(java.lang.String name,
             int id,
             User drawer,
             java.lang.String word)
        Constructs a new Table . A table is used by one or two players and contains the word to draw.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the table.
        id - the id the table.
        drawer - the drawer of the game.
        word - the word to draw.
